GSD.description:
ext4: avoid cycles in directory h-tree

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit 24b8206fec1db21d7e82f21f0b2ff5e5672cf5b3. For more details please see the references link.
